name: Lost Island (GrimsBaldruk)
description:
Hello there !

This is definitely a protoype, don't expect any UI neither advice. You wake up on an unknown island with no sign of life. Find you way through enigmas and strange mecanisms to free yourself from this island.

Controls :

Move : ZQSD or arrow keys

Left click and drag to move camera

Pick object : Mouse left click

Interact with objects : E

Project done as part of Unity course, halfway through the full course. Main goal was to ensure knowledge of Unity and its features (sound, animation, scripting). I will keep this project updated.
